text: The Man Who Sold His Skin is a 2020 international drama movie. It was directed by Kaouther Ben Hania and starred Yahya Mahayni, Dea Liane, Koen De Bouw, Monica Bellucci, Saad Lostan, Wim Delvoye. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 2021. It premiered in the Horizons section at the 77th Venice International Film Festival, where Yahya Mahayni won the Best Actor Award. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:2020 drama movies Category:Tunisian movies Category:French drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Turkish movies Category:Cypriot movies
title: The Man Who Sold His Skin
